text: Pavlo Serhíyovych Kuznietsov (; 1 May 1950 – 27 January 2022) was a Ukrainian politician. He was a member of the Communist Party of Ukraine. He was in the Verkhovna Rada from 1998 to 2002. He was born in Taganrog, Russian SFSR, Soviet Union. Kuznietsov died of COVID-19 in Kyiv, Ukraine on 27 January 2022, at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Kyiv Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada
title: Pavlo Kuznietsov
